name: Houchou Dojo
description: The walls of the hall are covered in knives. Each member of the dojo stands in line, awaiting their next challenger. Defeat all of them to earn the dojo's title!

name: Ittou Dojo
description: A single sword sits above the back wall of the dojo. Members sit with their legs crossed, lining the sides of the hall.

name: Ono Dojo
description: You find the halls of this dojo lined with weapons, most of which are axes.

name: Zuchi Dojo
description: The floor of the hall is covered in various hammers. The largest one sits in the center, and looks like it would take 10 men to lift.

name: Tsuyo Dojo
description: The walls of the hall are lined with weight-lifting equipment. A very large man stands in the center of the room lifting weights.
